name: Onix

passive.name: Stealth Rocks
passive.effect: When the opponent's Active Pokemon changes, deal 20 damage to that Pokemon (apply weakness and resistance for this damage as if it were Rock-type damage).

attacks.name: Sand Whip
attacks.effect: Put one damage counter on all of your opponent's Benched Pokemon.

attacks.name: Concrete Clash
attacks.effect: During your opponent's next turn, reduce damage done to Onix by 10 for every 2 more it has in its Retreat Cost than the opponent's Active Pokemon.

flavor: They dig tunnels at rapid speeds. An eccentric billionaire has started digging tunnels under cities using them.
